participant_1.background:
I'm not that concerned with looking my best.
i like to play outside.
I listen to Bruno Mars' music and reminisce about the good times I had playing sports with my family and friends when I was younger.
I enjoy running and skateboarding to stay active and clear my head.
I run every day because I want to be healthy and set a good example for my younger sibling.

participant_2.background:
I am a swimmer and my family members all have different occupations.
i love folk metal.
I like to collect Halloween toys and wear comfortable clothes.
I am a software engineer who works long hours and enjoys watching TV shows to unwind.
i like to make clothes.

content.text: Pretty good, just relaxing and listening to music. What's up with you?
Same here, just relaxing and listening to folk metal. I love this new album by Eluveitie!
I haven't heard of them, I'll check them out! What's your favorite song by them?
Oh man, that's a tough one. I'd probably have to say "A Rose for Epona" or "Quoth the Raven, Nevermore".
Those both sound awesome, I'll definitely check them out.
Cool! What kind of music are you into?
I listen to a lot of different stuff, but my favorite is probably Bruno Mars. He's just so catchy and upbeat.
I've heard some of his stuff, he's pretty good! I also like a lot of different kinds of music, but I'm not really into pop.
That's fair, I know it's not for everyone. What are some of your favorite bands?
I really like The Sword, Mastodon, and Ghost. They're all kind of heavy metal, but they have a lot of different influences.
Oh cool, I've heard of Mastodon, but I'll have to check out the other two.
You should! They're all great bands.
I will! Thanks for the recommendations!
